statements: SELECT * FROM product_testing_results;
SELECT product_id, test_result FROM product_testing_results;
SELECT testing_team_member, product_id FROM product_testing_results;
SELECT * FROM product_testing_results WHERE test_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM product_testing_results WHERE test_result = 'PASS';
SELECT * FROM product_testing_results WHERE test_result = 'Pass';
SELECT product_id, test_date FROM product_testing_results WHERE test_result = 'Fail' ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, test_result FROM product_testing_results WHERE test_result <> 'Pass' ORDER BY product_id ASC, test_result DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT testing_team_member FROM product_testing_results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-28';
SELECT product_id, test_result FROM product_testing_results WHERE test_result LIKE '%ed%' AND testing_team_member = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM products WHERE test_result = true;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM test_labs WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT lab_name, location, contact_person FROM test_labs ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 100;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM products WHERE testing_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE test_result = TRUE ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT lab_name, location FROM test_labs WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT lab_name, contact_person FROM test_labs ORDER BY lab_name;
SELECT * FROM ProductTestingResults;
SELECT product_id, test_result, tester_name FROM ProductTestingResults WHERE test_result = 'Pass';
SELECT product_id, test_result FROM ProductTestingResults ORDER BY test_result DESC;
SELECT tester_name, test_date FROM ProductTestingResults WHERE tester_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT product_id, tester_name FROM ProductTestingResults WHERE test_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ProductTestingResults PR JOIN TestReports TR ON PR.product_id = TR.product_id

SELECT PR.product_id, TR.test_result, RS.standard_name FROM ProductTestingResults PR JOIN TestReports TR ON PR.product_id = TR.product_id JOIN RegulatoryStandards RS ON TR.standard_id = RS.standard_id ORDER BY TR.test_date DESC
SELECT PR.product_id, PR.tester_name, TR.test_result FROM ProductTestingResults PR LEFT JOIN TestReports TR ON PR.product_id = TR.product_id WHERE TR.test_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT PR.product_id, PR.test_date, TR.tester_name, TR.test_result FROM ProductTestingResults PR JOIN TestReports TR ON PR.product_id = TR.product_id WHERE PR.product_id = 5
SELECT PR.product_id, TR.test_date, RS.requirement FROM ProductTestingResults PR JOIN TestReports TR ON PR.product_id = TR.product_id JOIN RegulatoryStandards RS ON RS.standard_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM Product ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM Product WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, tester FROM Product JOIN TestResult ON Product.product_id = TestResult.product_id;
SELECT standard_name, description FROM RegulatoryStandards ORDER BY standard_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc';
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM Product ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, ps.standard_id FROM Product p JOIN ProductStandard ps ON p.product_id = ps.product_id WHERE ps.standard_id = 1;
SELECT t.result, t.test_date, p.manufacturer, p.product_name FROM TestResult t JOIN Product p ON t.product_id = p.product_id WHERE t.result = 'Pass' AND YEAR(t.test_date) = 2022;
SELECT DISTINCT ps.standard_id FROM ProductStandard ps JOIN RegulatoryStandards rs ON ps.standard_id = rs.standard_id WHERE rs.standard_name LIKE '%ISO%';
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM Product WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT manufacturer, product_name, expiration_date FROM Product ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Product;
SELECT technician_name, technician_role FROM TestTechnician;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, expiration_date FROM Product ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT TestResult.test_date, TestResult.test_description, Product.product_name FROM TestResult JOIN Product ON TestResult.product_id = Product.product_id;

SELECT TestTechnician.technician_name, TestAssignment.assigned_date, Product.product_name FROM TestAssignment JOIN TestTechnician ON TestAssignment.technician_id = TestTechnician.technician_id JOIN Product ON TestAssignment.product_id = Product.product_id;
SELECT TestResult.test_date, TestResult.test_description, Product.manufacturer FROM TestResult JOIN Product ON TestResult.product_id = Product.product_id WHERE TestResult.test_passed = TRUE;
